Field.Description: Selects which lane statistics to show.
Field.Name: LANE_SELECT

Field.Description: If set, the selected counter is cleared upon read. Else, it is cleared only when user clears the counter through the FmalStatisticsCountControl register, or when gtimer starts.
Field.Name: CLEAR_ON_READ

Field.Description: 0: Count only data cells 1: Count only Link-Level-Flow-Control cells only 2: Reserved 3: Count all Relevant for data cell and data byte counters.
Field.Name: COUNTER_MODE

Field.Description: 0: Count without header 1: Count with header Relevant for data byte counters.
Field.Name: DATA_COUNTER_HEADER

Field.Description: Controlled by register FmalStatisticsOutputControl(dbal talbe FABRIC_STAT_CTRL).
Field.Name: FMAC_COUNTER

Field.Description: Receive 1519 to 1522 byte VLAN-tagged frame counter.
Field.Name: RMGV

Field.Description: Receive Length Out of Range Frame Counter.
Field.Name: RFLR

Field.Description: Receive MTU Check Error Frame Counter.
Field.Name: RMTUE

Field.Description: Receive single and double VLAN tagged frame counter.
Field.Name: RVLN

Field.Description: Receive unsupported DA for pause/PFC frame counter.
Field.Name: RXUDA

Field.Description: Receive PFC frame with enable bit set for Priority0.
Field.Name: RPFC0

Field.Description: Receive PFC frame transition XON to XOFF for Priority0.
Field.Name: RPFCOFF0

Field.Description: Receive PFC frame with enable bit set for Priority1.
Field.Name: RPFC1

Field.Description: Receive PFC frame transition XON to XOFF for Priority1.
Field.Name: RPFCOFF1

Field.Name: RPFC2

Field.Name: RPFCOFF2

Field.Name: RPFC3

Field.Name: RPFCOFF3

Field.Description: Receive PFC frame with enable bit set for Priority4.
Field.Name: RPFC4

Field.Description: Receive PFC frame transition XON to XOFF for Priority4.
Field.Name: RPFCOFF4

Field.Description: Receive PFC frame with enable bit set for Priority5.
Field.Name: RPFC5

Field.Description: Receive PFC frame transition XON to XOFF for Priority5.
Field.Name: RPFCOFF5

Field.Description: Receive PFC frame with enable bit set for Priority6.
Field.Name: RPFC6

Field.Description: Receive PFC frame transition XON to XOFF for Priority6.
Field.Name: RPFCOFF6

Field.Description: Receive PFC frame with enable bit set for Priority7.
Field.Name: RPFC7

Field.Description: Receive PFC frame transition XON to XOFF for Priority7.
Field.Name: RPFCOFF7

Field.Description: Transmit 1519 to 1522 byte VLAN-tagged frame counter.
Field.Name: TMGV

Field.Description: Transmit PFC frame with enable bit set for Priority0.
Field.Name: TPFC0

Field.Description: Transmit PFC frame transition XON to XOFF for Priority0.
Field.Name: TPFCOFF0

Field.Description: Transmit PFC frame with enable bit set for Priority1.
Field.Name: TPFC1

Field.Description: Transmit PFC frame transition XON to XOFF for Priority1.
Field.Name: TPFCOFF1

Field.Description: Transmit PFC frame with enable bit set for Priority2.
Field.Name: TPFC2

Field.Description: Transmit PFC frame transition XON to XOFF for Priority2.
Field.Name: TPFCOFF2

Field.Description: Transmit PFC frame with enable bit set for Priority3.
Field.Name: TPFC3

Field.Description: Transmit PFC frame transition XON to XOFF for Priority3.
Field.Name: TPFCOFF3

Field.Description: Transmit PFC frame with enable bit set for Priority4.
Field.Name: TPFC4

Field.Description: Transmit PFC frame transition XON to XOFF for Priority4.
Field.Name: TPFCOFF4

Field.Description: Transmit PFC frame with enable bit set for Priority7.

Field.Name: TPFCOFF7

Field.Description: Transmit PFC/Per-Priority Pause Control Frame Counter.
Field.Name: TXPP

Field.Description: Transmit runt packet with invalid FCS counter.
Field.Name: TFRG

Field.Description: Transmit single and double VLAN tagged frame counter.
Field.Name: TVLN

Field.Description: Transmit double VLAN tagged frame counter.
Field.Name: TDVLN

AppDB.Name: NIF_CLU_MIB_COUNTERS_DEDICATED
AppDB.OneLineDescription: CLU MIB counters commone between all ETHUs

Field.Description: Receive Truncated Frame Counter (due to RX FIFO full).
Field.Name: RTRFU

Field.Description: Receive Physical Type LLFC message counter.
Field.Name: RX_LLFC_PHY

Field.Description: Receive Logical Type LLFC message Counter.
Field.Name: RX_LLFC_LOG

Field.Description: Receive Type LLFC message with CRC error Counter.
Field.Name: RX_LLFC_CRC

Field.Description: Receive HCFC message with CRC Error counter.
Field.Name: RX_HCFC_CRC

Field.Description: Transmit Logical Type LLFC message counter.
Field.Name: TX_LLFC_LOG

AppDB.Name: NIF_ILKN_RX_STATS_ACC
AppDB.OneLineDescription: Configure ILKN RX stats, controls per logic port.

Field.Description: Counter type names match exactly with the recommended statistics from the Interlaken Protocol Definition RX counter types.
Field.Name: TYPE

Field.Description: When TYPE field = 0000 then ADDR7:0 represent channel number, When TYPE field = 1000, 1001, and 1010, then ADDR7:0 represent serdes lane. All other combinations of TYPE does not represent anything and therefore should be set to zeros.
Field.Name: ADDR

AppDB.Name: NIF_ILKN_TX_STATS_ACC
AppDB.OneLineDescription: Configure ILKN TX stats, controls per logic port.

Field.Description: Counter type names match exactly with the recommended statistics from the Interlaken Protocol Definition TX counter types.
Field.Name: TYPE

Field.Description: When TYPE field = 0000 then ADDR7:0 represent channel number, When TYPE field = 1000, 1001, and 1010, then ADDR7:0 represent serdes lane. All other combinations of TYPE does not represent anything and therefore should be set to zeros.
Field.Name: ADDR

AppDB.Name: NIF_ILKN_STATS
AppDB.OneLineDescription: ILKN Counters for RX/TX_Packets, RX/TX_Bytes, and RX/TX_Bad_Packets, controls per logic port.

AppDB.Name: NIF_ILKN_ELK_FEC_COUNTERS
AppDB.OneLineDescription: ILKN Counters for Rx Fec Correctable/Uncorrectable, controls per ILKN id.

Field.Description: Selects which lane offset fec counter to show.
Field.Name: FEC_UNIT
